content: Set terminal title: echo -e "\e]2;Implementation: BRP tools restructuring and naming standardization\007"
MetaTodo: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Create src/brp_tools/watch/ directory structure and mod.rs
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings
Move src/brp_tools/support/request_handler/ to src/brp_tools/request_handler/
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings
Create src/brp_tools/watch/support/ directory and move watch support files (watch_logger.rs, watch_manager.rs, watch_response.rs, watch_task.rs) with simplified names
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings
Move and rename watch tool files: brp_get_watch.rs → watch/bevy_get_watch.rs, brp_list_watch.rs → watch/bevy_list_watch.rs
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings
Move and rename remaining watch files: bevy_stop_watch.rs → watch/brp_stop_watch.rs, bevy_list_active_watches.rs → watch/brp_list_active.rs
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings
Move bevy_shutdown.rs from brp_tools to app_tools and rename to brp_extras_shutdown.rs
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings
Rename app_tools files with brp_ prefixes: list_apps.rs → brp_list_bevy_apps.rs, list_brp_apps.rs → brp_list_brp_apps.rs, list_examples.rs → brp_list_bevy_examples.rs
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings
Rename remaining app_tools files: launch_app.rs → brp_launch_bevy_app.rs, launch_example.rs → brp_launch_bevy_example.rs
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings
Update all mod.rs files in brp_tools/, brp_tools/watch/, app_tools/ to declare moved/renamed modules
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings
Update imports in registry.rs for moved/renamed modules
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings
Update tool_definitions.rs and any other files with references to renamed tools/modules
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features
Fix any clippy issues (no dead code, no _ prefixes)
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
Task a new subagent to do a code review of the changes - focus on identifying duplication and complexity (read-only)
When subagent returns, STOP and review the suggested changes with the user
